metadata.title: CVE-2021-23648 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The package @braintree/sanitize-url before 6.0.0 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper sanitization in sanitizeUrl function.

criterions.comment: node-mermaid package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
